vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract with The Northstar Construction, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of nine, for the construction of the Kleberg Trail Phase I Project, to provide a 12-foot wide and approximately 0.74-mile-long new concrete trail including prefabricated bridge from the Dallas Area Rapid Transit Buckner Station located at 8008 Elam Road to Crawford Memorial Park at Bridges Street - Not to exceed $1,438,777.00 - Financing: Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund ($719,388.50) and Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($719,388.50)
vote.description: Authorize a construction services contract with The Northstar Construction, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of nine, for the construction of the Kleberg Trail Phase I Project, to provide a 12-foot wide and approximately 0.74-mile-long new concrete trail including prefabricated bridge from the Dallas Area Rapid Transit Buckner Station located at 8008 Elam Road to Crawford Memorial Park at Bridges Street - Not to exceed $1,438,777.00 - Financing: Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund ($719,388.50) and Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($719,388.50)
